item.title: SnowBallSPAM (Club-Penguin) | Let's have a snowball fight... Mwahahaha!
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

Lol. Nevermind about this script, it’s uselss. I tested it out with my friend and he said he didn’t see all kinds of snowballs fly around. So I’m guessing it’s client side for you to see it. And all the other players only see you throwing snowballs slowly. Damn you anti-spam! :mad:

Read full topic

item.title: SnowBallSPAM (Club-Penguin) | Let's have a snowball fight... Mwahahaha!
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

[size=7][COLOR=Red]Resolution 1152 x 864 REQUIRED![/COLOR][/size]

I was really really bored playing club-penguin, so I made this semi-fun and anti-bordem script.
Think of it as a speed hack for throwing snowballs.

This script is very basic, DOES NOT USE STANDARDS, such as: I didn’t cap, I didn’t do the wavey thing with the script, etc.
The reason of this is because I wanted to make it quickly and didn’t really plan on releasing it, but I thought people would use it if they play CP (Club-penguin).

BUT. It does have a choice of how fast you want it to throw using a very basic choicer thingy majig (const crap like choosing colors, etc.).

Have fun.

[code]//SnowBallSPAM
// Club-Penguin
// Created by Dizzy
// Go to populated area for best results =)
// Club penguin just got owned

program SnowBallSPAM;
var x,y:Integer;
Const
Speed = 1; // How fast do you want to throw? (Milliseconds)
begin
repeat
movemouse(202,456);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(342,346);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(202,456);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(198,325);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(202,456);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(142,290);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(202,456);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(344,363);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(202,456);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(319,270);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(202,456);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(466,292);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(202,456);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(502,295);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(202,456);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(26,382);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(202,456);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(596,300);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(202,456);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(499,241);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(202,456);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(473,243);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(202,456);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
movemouse(338,362);
getmousepos(x,y);
sleep(Speed);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(Speed);
until(false)
end.[/code]
